answers.text:
John,
Attached is a volunteer compensation best practices guideline developed for the Oregon Fire Chiefs Association, the Oregon Fire Districts Directors Association, and the Oregon Volunteer Firefighters Association. This list is representative of the most common practices found to be actively used within organizations that use volunteer firefighters. Hopefully it provides you with some incentive ideas.

author: John Elsesser
text: We are looking for ideas for incentives for volunteer firefighters which do not run afoul with IRS regulations.   Our members just want some mileage payment but do not want to keep any logs.  We already offer a length in service program.  Any other good workable ideas?
title: volunteer Fire incentives
